text: Ani ti velahi athava, jevha amhi parvatala chatrisarakhe tyancyavara adhantarita thevale ani tyanna khatri jhali ki ata tyancyavara ye'una kosalela ani amhi pharmavile, ki amhi jo grantha tumhala pradana kela ahe tyaca drdhatapurvaka svikara kara ani laksata theva yatale adesa, yasathi ki tumhi allahace bhaya balagu lagave
